common.viewWarningPara2: SOL to interact with the app, click to open the wallet UI

trade.limitOrderWarning: Limit orders will only execute if sufficient liquidity is available at the time of order execution.
trade.shortWarningLine1: Max payout on short is equivalent to the borrowed USDC (size).
trade.shortWarningLine2: More about the peer2pool perp model
trade.onlyUsdcAllowed: Only USDC is allowed as collateral for short positions.
trade.collateralValueMustBeAtLeast10: Collateral value must be at least $10
trade.cannotVerifyLiquidity: Cannot verify liquidity - missing price data for {symbol}. Please try again later.
trade.sltpNotAvailableInLimitOrderMode: SL/TP is not available in Limit Order mode.
trade.fullyBackedAssetsTooltip: For fully backed assets, long positions must use the same token as collateral. For shorts or longs on non-backed assets, collateral should be USDC. If a different token is provided, it will be automatically swapped via Jupiter before opening or increasing the position.
trade.swapSlippageHint: This sets how much the price can move during the swap.
trade.maxSizeTooltip: The maximum size of the position you can open, for that market and side.
trade.availableLiquidityTooltip: This value represents the total size available for borrowing in this market and side by all traders. It depends on the pool's available liquidity and configuration restrictions.
trade.positionInfoTooltip: The values shown are estimates based on current prices. Actual results may vary at execution, especially if a token swap is involved. This means your initial leverage and liquidation price might differ slightly.

feesSection.feeInfoPara1: 0 BPS entry fees - 14 BPS exit fees
feesSection.swapFeeTooltip: The collateral you provided does not match the assets you're opening a position for, as such the platform will first have to do a Swap. Swap fees are dynamic and based on the Liquidity Pool's ratios, and currently that direction isn't favorable in term of fees. You can decide to go through or change the provided collateral.

editPosition.leverageBelowMinimum: This action would take the leverage below the minimum of 1.1x. Please adjust your input.
editPosition.useDirectlyAsCollateral: You can use {{token}} directly as collateral instead.
editPosition.positionAboveMaxLeverage: Your position is above the maximum leverage of {{leverage}}x, you cannot withdraw more collateral.

pickTokenModal.usingRightAssetAvoidSwap: Using the right asset avoid unnecessary swap.

closePosition.remainingCollateralMustBeAtLeast10: Remaining collateral must be at least $10
closePosition.sizeToCloseMustBeGreaterThan0: Size to close must be greater than $0
closePosition.closePositionTooltip: When closing a long position, you receive the same collateral you used to open it. When closing a short position, the collateral is returned in USDC. If you want a different asset, a Jupiter swap is required.
closePosition.exitFeesTooltip: Open fees are 0 bps, while close fees are 16 bps. This average to 8bps entry and close fees, but allow for opening exactly the requested position size.
closePosition.borrowFeesTooltip: Total of fees accruing continuously while the leveraged position is open, to pay interest rate on the borrowed assets from the Liquidity Pool.

sharePositionModal.shareOnX: Share on X (just paste your PnL image)
sharePositionModal.readyToShareOnSocialMedia: Ready to share on social media!
sharePositionModal.iJustMadeOnPosition: I just made {{value}} on {{side}} position on ${{token}}!

tradeHistory.failedToExportPositions: Failed to export positions. Please try again.
tradeHistory.noPositionsAvailableForDateRange: No positions available for date range {{from}} to {{to}}

stake.adxRewardsAccrue: ADX rewards automatically accrue at the end of every staking round.
stake.liquidStakedADXUnstake: Liquid staked ADX can be unstaked at any time. Locked ADX can be retrieved once the locking period is over.
stake.genesisRewardsTooltip: These rewards accrue over time for the first 180 days of the protocol. The amount is proportional to your participation in the Genesis Liquidity campaign. Thank you for being an early supporter of the protocol! üéä üéÅ
stake.roundDurationTooltip: Each round duration is ~6h (+/- some jitter due to Sablier on chain decentralized execution). At the end of a round, the accrued rewards become claimable, and a new round starts. The ADX and ALP rounds are not necessarily in sync.

ranked.bestPnlPercentDesc: Trader with the highest single profitable trade by percentage.
ranked.topLiquidationDesc: Trader with the largest single liquidation in USD value.
ranked.topBorrowFeesDesc: Trader who paid the most borrow fees in USD.
ranked.topExitFeesDesc: Trader who paid the most exit fees in USD.
ranked.mostTradesDesc: Trader who closed the most positions.
ranked.consecutiveWinsDesc: Trader with the longest winning streak.
ranked.consecutiveLossesDesc: Trader with the longest losing streak.
ranked.consecutiveLiquidationsDesc: Trader with the longest streak of liquidated trades.
ranked.firstBloodDesc: First trader to open and close a position with a PnL/Volume ratio of 10% in the competition.
ranked.lastStrawDesc: Last trader to close a position with a PnL/Volume ratio of 10% before the competition ends.
ranked.bestShitpostTweetDesc: Funniest or most viral shitpost about Adrena. Winner chosen by the team.
ranked.bestAnniversaryTweetDesc: Best tweet celebrating Adrena's anniversary. Winner chosen by the team.
ranked.bestFeatureIdeaDesc: Most valuable idea for improving Adrena, submitted on Discord. Winner selected by the team.
ranked.bestArtworkDesc: Coolest community artwork related to Adrena. Winner chosen by the team.
ranked.anniversaryCelebration: To celebrate our first year, we are hosting a special raffle party! Accumulate raffle tickets by trading and get a chance to win big prizes!
ranked.waitingForSeason: Waiting for the season to start

buy_alp.liquidityPoolDescription: The liquidity pool serves as the counterparty for traders, supplying the assets needed when users open leveraged positions. Essentially, traders borrow tokens to execute their trades, and pay fees for the service.
buy_alp.alpTokenDescription: The ALP token represents shares of said pool, and its value is backed by:
buy_alp.diversifiedIndexFund: A diversified index fund comprising JitoSOL, BONK, WBTC and USDC.
buy_alp.netPnL: The net profit and loss of traders within the ecosystem.
buy_alp.feesGenerated: 70% of all fees generated by the pool, including:
buy_alp.structureBenefits: This structure ensures ALP token holders benefit from both the pool's underlying assets and its trading activity.
buy_alp.feesAccrue: All fees continuously accrue in the pool when each trade closes.
buy_alp.jitoSolYield: LPers also benefit from JitoSOL native yield.
buy_alp.liquidityAmountFeeNotFound: Liquidity amount and fee not found
buy_alp.poolRatioReached: Pool ratio reached for this token
buy_alp.swaplessRouteTooltip: Use the swapless route to mint ALP directly with this token. No fees when minting with USDC. Fees apply when minting with non-stable assets.
buy_alp.availableLiquidityTooltip: Available {token} depends on pool ratios and what s currently borrowed by traders.
buy_alp.fullyUtilizedWait: If {token} is fully utilized, wait for traders to close positions.
buy_alp.redeemMoreThanAvailable: If you try to redeem more than available, consider DCA or another pair ‚Äî the pool will rebalance automatically.
buy_alp.needHelpDiscord: Need help? Reach out on Discord.
buy_alp.boostALP: Boost your ALP with leverage loop

monitoring.averageYieldAlpLast7d: Average yield for ALP in the last 7 days
monitoring.averageYieldAdxLast7d: Average yield for 540d staked ADX in the last 7 days
monitoring.newTradersLast24h: New traders in the last 24 hours
monitoring.newTradersLast7d: New traders in the last 7 days
monitoring.totalLiquidityJupiter: Total liquidity available through Jupiter aggregator

profile.nicknameMustBeBetween3To24: Nickname must be between 3 to 24 characters long
profile.traderProfileDescription: Your trader profile is required to trade. It tracks your PnL, fees, and trading stats, giving you a detailed view of your performance. It also serves as your Adrena identity in the ecosystem.
profile.carefulNicknameCost: Careful! Once your nickname is set, changing it will cost ADX. Choose wisely!
profile.nicknameMustBeAtLeast3: Nickname must be at least 3 characters
profile.youMustBeConnectedToEdit: You must be connected to edit your nickname
profile.youMustBeConnectedToUpdate: You must be connected to update your profile
profile.lockedUnlockByAchievement: Locked - Unlock by completing the achievement "{achievement}"
profile.registeredDomainSNS: Registered Domain through Solana Name Service (SNS)
profile.title: Title

referral.receive10PercentFee: And receive 10% of the trading fee
referral.grant10PercentFee: And grant 10% of your trading fees
referral.createProfileToActivate: Create your profile to activate referral system
referral.noRefereeYet: No referee yet. Share your referral link!
referral.notSupportingAnyone: You are currently not supporting anyone
referral.supportTeamDescription: You can support the Adrena team through the referral system by choosing the team as your referrer. This is purely philanthropic. It's a way to show your support and contribute to the team's funding.

mutagenLeaderboard.allTimeLeaderboardDescription: The ALL-TIME leaderboard tracks total Mutagen earned since launch.
mutagenLeaderboard.tradeToClimb: Trade to climb the ranks and boost your airdrop share‚Äîevery closed position counts!
mutagenLeaderboard.clickToScrollToRow: Click to scroll to your row
mutagenLeaderboard.generateMutagenToClimb: Generate {number} Mutagen to climb the ladder!
